thread.section_title: Laguna Pearl Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Laguna Pearl | lagunapearl.com
thread.title: Joyce Mason
thread.title_full: Laguna Pearl reviewed by Joyce Mason

author: Joyce Mason
title: Joyce Mason
text: Ordered my bracelet and really looked forward to getting it. When I received it, I discovered that I failed to take into account the pearls would take up space on the inside of the bracelet. I contacted them and arranged to return it. No problems. I sent it back and received my new bracelet. It is beautiful and it fits perfectly. Great company to get that perfect gift for yourself.
